title: Double-Teamed While She Slept: Her Secret Fantasy
description: Voluptuous cheerleader Grace has a secret fantasy - she wants to be used in her sleep by two men, for them to take her any way they want.She confides in her friend Jenny one night, and tells her all about her forbidden fantasy. However, unbeknown to her, Jenny's brother Chad and his friend Dean are listening in, and the two of them hatch a plan to give the sexy cheerleader what she's always wanted...This 4700+ word erotic story features two hot studs using a sexy sleeping girl in any way they want, oral sex, double penetration, and a shuddering climax that you won't soon forget!All characters in this work of fiction are over the age of 18. Strictly for adults ONLY!
author: Ashley Rhodes
